title: Clockwork Beast
text: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it.At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it., : Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
